sentences.sContent: Our specialty was messy girls: sociopath socialites, porn stars, retired riot grrrls, anyone we deemed interesting.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our specialty was messy girls: sociopath socialites, porn stars, retired riot grrrls, anyone we deemed interesting.
sentences.sCn: 我们的特长是那些生活混乱的女孩：反社会的名流，色情明星，引发暴乱的女孩（原文是grrrls,我想应该是girls吧），总之，所有我们觉得有趣的人。

words.tran: 社会的（等于sociologic）；社会学的；针对社会问题的
社会人际学；计量社会学

trans.tranCn: 反社会的人, 不爱社交的人
trans.tranOther: someone whose behaviour towards other people is considered unacceptable, strange, and possibly dangerous
